author: AleksanderBodurri
message:
build(devtools): migrate ng-devtools library to bazel

Allows the ng-devtools library to be built with bazel. ng-devtools can now be used as a dependency in other bazel build rules.

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,37 @@
+load("//tools:angular_ts_library.bzl", "ng_ts_library")
+load("@npm//@bazel/typescript:index.bzl", "ts_config", "ts_library")
+
+package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"])
+
+exports_files(["tsconfig.lib.json"])
+
+ts_config(
+    name = "tsconfig-lib",
+    src = "tsconfig.lib.json",
+    deps = ["//:tsconfig.json"],
+)
+
+ng_ts_library(
+    name = "ng-devtools",
+    srcs = ["index.ts"],
+    deps = [
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src",
+        "//projects/protocol",
+        "@npm//ngx-flamegraph",
+        "@npm//@angular/core",
+        "@npm//memo-decorator",
+        "@npm//webtreemap",
+        "@npm//@types/d3",
+        "@npm//d3",
+        "@npm//@angular/material",
+        "@npm//@angular/forms",
+        "@npm//@angular/common",
+        "@npm//@angular/platform-browser-dynamic",
+        "@npm//@angular/cdk",
+        "@npm//@angular/animations",
+        "@npm//rxjs",
+        "@npm//@types",
+    ],
+    tsconfig = ":tsconfig-lib",
+    module_name = "ng-devtools",
+)
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+export * from './src/public-api';

@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@
+load("//tools:angular_ts_library.bzl", "ng_ts_library")
+
+package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"])
+
+ng_ts_library(
+    name = "src",
+    srcs = ["public-api.ts"],
+    deps = [
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/application-environment",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/application-operations",
+    ],
+    tsconfig = "//projects/ng-devtools:tsconfig-lib"
+)
+
+

@@ -0,0 +1,51 @@
+load("//tools:angular_ts_library.bzl", "ng_ts_library")
+load("@io_bazel_rules_sass//:defs.bzl", "sass_binary")
+
+package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"])
+
+sass_binary(
+    name = "devtools-component-styles",
+    src = "devtools.component.scss",
+)
+
+ng_ts_library(
+    name = "lib",
+    srcs = glob(
+        include = ["*.ts"],
+        exclude = ["theme-service.ts"]
+    ),
+    angular_assets = [
+        "devtools.component.html",
+        ":devtools-component-styles"
+    ],
+    deps = [
+        "//projects/protocol",
+        ":theme",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/devtools-tabs",
+        "@npm//@angular/core",
+        "@npm//@angular/material",
+        "@npm//@angular/forms",
+        "@npm//@angular/common",
+        "@npm//@angular/platform-browser-dynamic",
+        "@npm//@angular/cdk",
+        "@npm//@angular/animations",
+        "@npm//rxjs",
+        "@npm//@types",
+    ],
+    tsconfig = "//projects/ng-devtools:tsconfig-lib"
+)
+
+ng_ts_library(
+    name = "theme",
+    srcs = glob(
+        include = ["theme-service.ts"],
+    ),
+    deps = [
+        "@npm//@angular/core",
+        "@npm//rxjs",
+        "@npm//@types",
+    ],
+    tsconfig = "//projects/ng-devtools:tsconfig-lib"
+)
+
+

+load("//tools:angular_ts_library.bzl", "ng_ts_library")

+    deps = [

+    ],
+    tsconfig = "//projects/ng-devtools:tsconfig-lib"
+)
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+load("//tools:angular_ts_library.bzl", "ng_ts_library")
+
+package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"])
+
+ng_ts_library(
+    name = "application-operations",
+    srcs = ["index.ts"],
+    deps = [

+)
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,63 @@
+load("//tools:angular_ts_library.bzl", "ng_ts_library")
+load("@io_bazel_rules_sass//:defs.bzl", "sass_binary")
+load("@npm//@bazel/concatjs:index.bzl", "karma_web_test_suite")
+load("@npm//@bazel/typescript:index.bzl", "ts_config", "ts_library")
+
+package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"])
+
+sass_binary(
+    name = "devtools-tabs-component-styles",
+    src = "devtools-tabs.component.scss",
+)
+
+ng_ts_library(
+    name = "devtools-tabs",
+    srcs = [
+        "devtools-tabs.component.ts",
+        "devtools-tabs.module.ts",
+    ],
+    angular_assets = [
+        "devtools-tabs.component.html",
+        ":devtools-tabs-component-styles"
+    ],
+    deps = [
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib:theme",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/devtools-tabs/tab-update",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/devtools-tabs/router-tree",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/devtools-tabs/profiler",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/application-environment",
+        "//projects/protocol",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/devtools-tabs/directive-explorer",
+        "@npm//@angular/core",
+        "@npm//@angular/common",
+        "@npm//@angular/material",
+        "@npm//rxjs",
+        "@npm//@types",
+    ],
+    tsconfig = "//projects/ng-devtools:tsconfig-lib"
+)
+
+ts_library(
+    name = "devtools-tabs-test",
+    testonly = True,
+    srcs = ["devtools-tabs.spec.ts"],
+    deps = [
+        ":devtools-tabs",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/devtools-tabs/tab-update",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/application-environment",
+        "//projects/protocol",
+    ],
+)
+
+karma_web_test_suite(
+    name = "test",
+    browsers = [
+        "@io_bazel_rules_webtesting//browsers:chromium-local",
+    ],
+    tags = ["native"],
+    deps = [
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/devtools-tabs:devtools-tabs-test",
+        "//src:rxjs_umd_modules",
+        "@npm//:node_modules/tslib/tslib.js",
+    ],
+)
@@ -1,19 +1,13 @@

@@ -0,0 +1,55 @@
+load("//tools:angular_ts_library.bzl", "ng_ts_library")
+load("@io_bazel_rules_sass//:defs.bzl", "multi_sass_binary")
+
+package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"])
+
+multi_sass_binary(
+    name = "property-view-styles",
+    srcs = [
+        "property-view.component.scss",
+        "property-view-tree.component.scss",
+        "property-view-header.component.scss",
+        "property-view-body.component.scss",
+        "property-preview.component.scss",
+        "property-editor.component.scss",
+        "property-tab-body.component.scss",
+    ],
+)
+
+
+ng_ts_library(
+    name = "property-view",
+    srcs = [
+        "property-view.component.ts",
+        "property-view-tree.component.ts",
+        "property-view-header.component.ts",
+        "property-view-body.component.ts",
+        "property-preview.component.ts",
+        "property-editor.component.ts",
+        "property-tab-body.component.ts",
+        "property-view.module.ts",
+    ],
+    angular_assets = [
+        "property-view.component.html",
+        "property-view-tree.component.html",
+        "property-view-header.component.html",
+        "property-view-body.component.html",
+        "property-preview.component.html",
+        "property-editor.component.html",
+        "property-tab-body.component.html",
+        ":property-view-styles"
+    ],
+    deps = [
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/devtools-tabs/directive-explorer/property-resolver",
+        "//projects/protocol",
+        "//projects/ng-devtools/src/lib/devtools-tabs/directive-explorer/directive-forest/index-forest",
+        "@npm//@angular/core",
+        "@npm//@angular/common",
+        "@npm//@angular/forms",
+        "@npm//@angular/cdk",
+        "@npm//@angular/material",
+        "@npm//rxjs",
+        "@npm//@types",
+    ],
+    tsconfig = "//projects/ng-devtools:tsconfig-lib"
+)
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@
+load("//tools:angular_ts_library.bzl", "ng_ts_library")
+load("@io_bazel_rules_sass//:defs.bzl", "multi_sass_binary")
+
+package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"])
+
+multi_sass_binary(
+    name = "profiler-styles",
+    srcs = [
+        "profiler.component.scss",
+        "profiler-import-dialog.component.scss",
+    ],
+)
+
+ng_ts_library(

@@ -0,0 +1,67 @@
+# webtreemap
+
+> **New 2017-Oct-16**: master is now webtreemap v2, a complete rewrite with
+> bug fixes, more features, and a different (simpler) API. If you're looking
+> for the old webtreemap, see the [v1] branch.
+
+[v1]: https://github.com/evmar/webtreemap/tree/v1
+
+A simple treemap implementation using web technologies (DOM nodes, CSS styling
+and transitions) rather than a big canvas/svg/plugin. It's usable as a library
+as part of a larger web app, but it also includes a command-line app that dumps
+a self-contained HTML file that displays a map.
+
+Play with a [demo].
+
+[demo]: http://evmar.github.io/webtreemap/demo.html
+
+## Usage
+
+### Web
+
+The data format is a tree of `Node`, where each node is an object in the shape
+described at the top of [tree.ts].
+
+[tree.ts]: https://github.com/evmar/webtreemap/blob/master/tree.ts
+
+```html
+<script src='webtreemap.js'></script>
+<script>
+// Container must have its own width/height.
+const container = document.getElementById('myContainer');
+// See typings for full API definition.
+webtreemap.render(container, data, options);
+```
+
+### Command line
+
+```sh
+$ webtreemap -o output_file < my_data
+```
+
+Command line data format is space-separated lines of "size path", where size is
+a number and path is a '/'-delimited path. This is exactly the output produced
+by du, so this works:
+
+```sh
+$ du -ab some_path | webtreemap -o out.html
+```
+
+But note that there's nothing file-system-specific about the data format -- it
+just uses slash as a nesting delimiter.
+
+## Development
+
+### Web piece
+
+Use `npm run dev` to bring up file watchers that keep the demo JS bundle up
+to date. Then load `demo/demo.html` in a browser. The file generated by
+`npm run dev` is also used by the command line app.
+
+### Command line app
+
+Use `tsc -w` to keep the npm-compatible JS up to date, then run e.g.:
+
+```
+$ du -ab node_modules/ | node build/cli.js --title 'node_modules usage' -o demo.html
+```

@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+{
+  "compilerOptions": {
+    "rootDir": "./",
+    "types": [],
+    "lib": ["dom", "es2018"],
+    "module": "es6",
+    "target": "es5"
+  },
+  "include": ["./dist"],
+  "files": ["dist/webtreemap.js"]
+}
